samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: This example describes key features of JavaScript textbox such as a floating label, input group, placeholder, validation states, sizing, types, and more.

samples.name: Multiline TextBox
samples.description: The example exposes a JavaScript Multiline TextBox (textarea). It helps to render address, feedback, and more in HTML5 form with customizable rows and columns.

samples.name: Adornments
samples.description: The example exposes a JavaScript TextBox with adornments support. It helps to render custom elements before or after the input element.
